item.description: Come celebrate Cinco de Mayo at Agave Restaurant in Newburyport Our name is inspired by the desert plant known as agavé. Some say the word agavé means ‘stone that cuts’. To us, Agave means fresh, authentic Mexican food served by our enthusiastic staff, making your dining experience a memorable one! From the time you enter Agave Mexican Bistro to the last sip of your Margarita, we want to you taste, smell and enjoy an authentic Mexican experience. We use high quality ingredients to create the most authentic experience of Mexican culinary technique North of Boston. We've even won awards to confirm it.
item.name: Celebrate Cinco de Mayo at Agave Restaurant in Newburyport
